targets.query:
from(bucket: "sso-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "users")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "total")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "total_users")

from(bucket: "sso-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "postgresql")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "numbackends")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.db == "FourthCourseFirstProject")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "connections")

from(bucket: "sso-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "usage_idle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.cpu == "cpu-total")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: 100.0 - r._value }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "cpu_usage")

from(bucket: "sso-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "used_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "memory_usage")

from(bucket: "sso-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_request")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "count")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["path", "status"])
  |> yield(name: "requests")

from(bucket: "sso-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_request")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "duration_seconds")
  |> group(columns: ["path"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: (column, tables=<-) => tables |> quantile(q: 0.95, column: column), createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "p95")

from(bucket: "sso-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "postgresql")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "deadlocks" or r._field == "conflicts")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.db == "FourthCourseFirstProject")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "pg_issues")

from(bucket: "sso-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "usage_idle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.cpu == "cpu-total")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: 100.0 - r._value, _field: "cpu_usage" }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "sso-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "used_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
